description.value:
These miniatures come in many shapes, often resembling a programmer's personal avatar or popular media character, such as Captain Concierge or Zo!. The plush helps organize your thoughts; you gain a +1 item bonus to Computers checks.

Activateâ€”Secret Password 1 (auditory)

Effect You whisper a secret passcode known only to yourself and your programmer's plushie, securing a computer, container, door, or lock from intrusion as a 1st-rank @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Lock] with a DC of 18. Any creature can bypass this lock using the passcode while touching the target with the programmer's plushie.
